name: THE HAMPTONS CENTER FOR REHABILITATION AND NURSING
description: A skilled nursing and short-term rehabilitation facility.
sampleDescriptions: To secure a meeting with the U.S. Embassy in the Philippines to discuss problems nurses that have been hired in the Philippines are having getting visas to travel to the U.S. and work in nursing homes

Made contacts seeking advice and guidance on a situation that is preventing nurses who have been hired in the Philippines from getting visas to travel to the U.S. and work in certain nursing homes, in
